synopsis.text:
Country of Paradice's Prince Kotenco is entrusted with the crucial task of safeguarding the celestial "Angel Star" for his Queen in this delightful gag strip anime tailored for young audiences. Generally well-behaved and kind-hearted, Kotenco undergoes a striking transformation into the mischievous Matenco when dark forces emerge. This naughty alter ego creates chaos and disruption around him, but with the power of the angel ring, Matenco can revert back to the gentle Kotenco.

As the malevolent ruler and Devil of the Country of the Ground set their sights on the peaceful Paradice, Kotenco must rise to the challenge and protect the precious Angel Star. Can Kotenco successfully defend his realm and keep the Angel Star out of the clutches of evil? Join Kotenco and Matenco on their thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
